docs.summary: The wix-groups-backend module contains functionality for managing groups on your site from backend code.
description: Use the Groups API to create and manage groups on your site.
To enable groups backend API functionality for your site, add the [Wix Groups](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-groups-adding-and-setting-up-wix-groups) application to your site.
The following functionality is available via the wix-groups-backend API:
+ [Assign](wix-groups-backend.roles-obj/assignrole) roles to members of a group.
+ [Unasssign](wix-groups-backend.roles-obj/unassignrole) roles to members of a group.
+ `PUBLIC`: Site visitors can see the group and its content in the list of groups. Site members can join the group.
+ `PRIVATE`: Site visitors can see the group in the list of groups, but only group members can see its content. Site members can request to join the group.
+ `SECRET`: Only group members can see the group and its content in the list of groups. Site members can only join if invited by group members.
#### Site member wants to create a group
+ Site admins determine who can create a group. This setting can be found in your site's Dashboard under **Groups Application > General Settings > Group Creation**.

+ If set to site members with admin approval, site members can create a group using the [`createGroup()`](wix-groups-backend.Groups/creategroup) function, and the group becomes a `createRequest` with a status of `PENDING`. The site admin either approves or rejects the request to create a group.
+ If set to all site members, site members can create a group using the `createGroup()` function (no approval required).
+ If set to only admins, only admins can create a group using the `createGroup()` function.
+ When a group is created, the newly created group is added to the Groups List page of your site.
#### Site member wants to join a group
+ Group members with admin permissions determine who can join their group by setting their [Group Privacy Levels](wix-groups-backend/introduction/#group-privacy-levels).
+ If a group's privacy level is set to `PRIVATE`, a site member can request to join the group on your site's Groups List page.
+ Only a group member with admin permissions can approve or reject site member requests to join the group.
+ When a site member's request to join the group is approved, the member is added to the group.
+ If a group's privacy level is set to `PUBLIC`, a site member can join the group (no request necessary).
+ If a group's privacy level is set to `SECRET`, only site members added by an existing group member can join the group (no request necessary).
#### Group member wants to add a site member to their group
+ Group members with admin permissions determine whether group members can add additional members to their group.
+ This setting can be found in your site's Dashboard under **Groups Application > Your Group > Admin Tools > Member Permissions**.
+ If set to all members, group members can add additional members to the group using the [`addGroupMembers()`](wix-groups-backend.Members/addGroupMembers) function (no approval required).
+ If set to admins only, only admins can add additional members to the group using the `addGroupMembers()` function.
|| `deleteGroup()`, `updateGroup()`|Site admin, group member with admin permissions

|| `listGroup()`, `getGroup()`, `queryGroup()`|For public & private groups: Any site member
For secret groups: Group members, site admin, group member with admin permissions

|[JoinRequests](wix-groups-backend.joinRequests/introduction)| `approveJoinRequests()`, `listJoinRequests()`, `queryJoinRequests()`, `rejectJoinRequests()`|Site admin, group member with admin permissions
|| `removeGroupMembers()`|Site admin, group member with admin permissions

|| `listGroupMembers()`, `listMemberships()`, `queryGroupMembers()`, `queryMemberships()`|For public & private groups: Any site member
For secret groups: Group members, site admin, group member with admin permissions
|[Roles](wix-groups-backend.Roles/introduction)| `assignRole()`, `unassignRole()`|Site admin, group member with admin permissions

docs.summary: The CreateRequests API provides functionality for managing requests to create a group.

members.name: image
members.doc: Group image. Group members cannot upload their own images.

members.name: position
members.doc: Position of the corner of the cover image (or image)

members.name: image
members.doc: Group image. Group members cannot upload their own images.

members.name: position
members.doc: Position of the corner of the cover image (or image)

members.name: _id
members.doc: Group ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Group name.

members.name: slug
members.doc: Slug (part of a group's URL, for example, `'https:/example.com/groups/{slug}'`).

members.name: description
members.doc: Group description.

members.name: privacyStatus
members.doc:
Group privacy level.
One of:
+ `PUBLIC`: Site visitors can see the group and its content in the list of groups. Site members can join the group. 
+ `PRIVATE`: Site visitors can see the group in the list of groups, but only group members can see its content. Site members can request to join the group.
+ `SECRET`: Only group members can see the group and its content in the list of groups. Site members can only join if invited by group members with group admin permissions, or other group members.

members.name: coverImage
members.doc: Group cover image.

members.name: memberTitle
members.doc: What group members are called. For example, 'Coworkers', 'Friends', or 'Students'.

members.name: settings
members.doc: Group settings.

members.name: lastActivityDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was last active. For example, a post or comment.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was created.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was last updated.

members.name: owner
members.doc: Site member ID of the group creator.

members.name: membersCanInvite
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to add/invite new group members to group with any privacy level. When `false`, member additions/invitations are limited to group members with admin permissions. Defaults to `false`.

members.name: membersCanApprove
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to approve join group requests. When `false`, member approval is limited to the group members with admin permissions. Defaults to `false`.

members.name: welcomeMemberPostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a daily post about new members. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: groupUpdatePostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a post when group details are changed. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: showMemberList
members.doc: Whether all group members can view the group member list. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: membersCanInvite
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to add/invite new group members to group with any privacy level. When `false`, member additions/invitations are limited to group members with admin permissions. Defaults to `false`.

members.name: membersCanApprove
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to approve join group requests. When `false`, member approval is limited to the group members with admin permissions. Defaults to `false`.

members.name: welcomeMemberPostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a daily post about new members. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: groupUpdatePostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a post when group details are changed. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: showMemberList
members.doc: Whether all group members can view the group member list. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: width
members.doc: Logo image width.

members.name: height

members.name: mediaId

members.name: width

members.name: height

members.name: length
members.doc: Number of items in the current results page.

members.name: totalCount
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag indicating that the server failed to calculate the 'total' field.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: When `true`, prevents permission checks from running for the operation.

docs.summary: Position of the corner of the cover image (or image).

members.doc: horizontal coordinate.

members.name: y
members.doc: vertical coordinate.

members.doc: horizontal coordinate.

members.name: y
members.doc: vertical coordinate.

docs.summary: Group member role. When membership status is not `JOINED`, this is empty.

members.name: role
members.doc:
Group member role.
One of:
- `"MEMBER"`: Group member.
- `"ADMIN"`: Group member with admin permissions.
